name: Cloudy Meadows
description:
``````````````````````````````````````````````````````````

Description:

Cloudy meadows is an urban vertical community farm. Meet interesting people farm with composting and helpful animals. Traditional foods like Maze sweet potato and strawberries.

Controls:

*WASD to move

*E to interact

*Q to eat

*# row for hotbar

Contributors:

Christian Rodriguez - Lead programmer

David Kozdra - Art and Music

Patrick Mayer - Helped Christian with UI

Resources Used:

p5.js

``````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
